name: Trustroots for Developers
tagline: Docs and tools to help you build with Trustroots.
body:
As our API is still unstable and largely in development, please [contact us](https://www.trustroots.org/contact) if you want to build something. We're especially interested in native mobile apps for Trustroots.

### Reading
#### REST API
Programmatic access to read and write Trustroots data.
* [API documentation](http://developers.trustroots.org/docs/api/)
* oAuth __[coming later...](https://github.com/Trustroots/trustroots/issues/186)__

#### Style guide & Graphics
* [Style guide](https://github.com/Trustroots/media/blob/master/style-guide/Trustroots-Styleguide.pdf) (pdf)
* See [media repository](https://github.com/trustroots/media) for more

#### Status
Is Trustroots.org down or is it just me? [Check uptime](http://status.trustroots.org/)

#### Bugs & feature requests
Expect problems and eat them for breakfast. If you have questions, don't hesitate to contact us.
- [Contact us](https://www.trustroots.org/contact/)
- [Report issues](https://github.com/Trustroots/trustroots/issues)
- [Join the chat](http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=trustroots)

#### Join development?
Become a volunteer and make a difference!
- [Contact us](https://www.trustroots.org/contact/)
- [Start with development](https://github.com/Trustroots/trustroots/wiki/Development)
- [Project on GitHub](https://github.com/trustroots/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
